title: Sampler, 1744
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on wool
Technique: embroidery on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Four cross borders; one containing verse; two showing floral patterns and squirrels; the inscription "Sarah Cook, her sampler 1744" surrounded by angular floral border with stags in the corners.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1744.
1744. Medium: silk embroidery on wool
Technique: embroidery on plain weave. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-27.
